name: Spacious 2BR | Downtown Boston | Full Kitchen| GLS
description:
Looking for the perfect accommodations in the Heart of Boston? We got you covered! Just a couple blocks of Boston Common, Chinatown, & the top arts venues in town, this apartment is the perfect home base for any trip to Boston. Highlights include:
●Luxurious decor, high ceilings, and large windows
●Modern kitchen w/ appliances
●Hotel-style lobby, fitness room, and 24-hr concierge

Servicing Boston hospital patients including Boston Children’s Hospital.

License number
Exempt: This listing is a unit that has contracts with hospitals
